text: Andrew Raymond "Ray" McFall (26 November 1926 - 8 January 2015) was a British businessman. He owned The Cavern Club in Liverpool and was well known for promoting The Beatles during the early 1960s. McFall was born in Garston, south Liverpool. He married Shirley Wilkins in 1952, and had six children with her: three sons and three daughters. He retired in 1999. McFall died on 8 January 2015 at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:The Beatles Category:English businesspeople Category:People from Liverpool
title: Ray McFall
